title: World Series: Framber Valdez and Astros Even Series With Game 2 Win
description: Houston set the tone against Philadelphia with three straight hits to start Game 2, giving Framber Valdez and the Astros bullpen all the support they needed for a big win at home.
dc:creator: Scott Miller

media:content.media:credit: Annie Mulligan for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Jose Altuve started Game 2 by doubling on the first pitch he saw. The struggling second baseman finished the day with three hits.
